Package com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.frontend.erparams Description

Form field parameters (ERParams) with validation and data binding for ODP forms.

Overview

This package contains ERParam classes that represent individual form fields in the ODP system. ERParams extend the RDS framework's ERPParam class and provide data binding, validation, and user interface control for form fields like dropdowns, text inputs, and date pickers.

ERParam Hierarchy

Base Classes

  • OdpServiceBasedAbstractParam - Base for params that need access to IOdpService
  • OdpCompanyBasedAbstractParam - Base for params filtered by company context

Specialized Params

  • OdpCompanyParam - Company selection (all companies)
  • OdpCompanyByUserParam - Company selection (filtered by user permissions)
  • OdpCurrencyParam - Currency selection (filtered by company)
  • OdpSupplierParam - Supplier selection (filtered by company)
  • OdpCDCParam - Cost Center selection (filtered by company)
  • OdpCDRParam - Revenue Center selection (filtered by company)
  • OdpAccountVDSParam - Account/VDS selection (filtered by company)
  • OdpStateParam - ODP state selection for filtering

ERParam Responsibilities

Data Binding

ERParams bind form fields to domain model properties:

  • Convert domain objects to display strings
  • Convert user input back to domain objects
  • Handle null values and empty selections

Validation

ERParams validate user input:

  • Required field validation
  • Format validation (dates, numbers)
  • Business rule validation
  • Cross-field validation

UI Control

ERParams control field behavior:

  • Enable/disable based on state
  • Show/hide based on conditions
  • Populate dropdown lists
  • Configure autocomplete behavior

Common Patterns

Service-Based Param

Params that load options from the service layer: 


 public class OdpCurrencyParam extends OdpCompanyBasedAbstractParam<OdpCurrency> {
     // Load currencies from service
     protected List<OdpCurrency> retrieveElements() throws Exception {
         return getIOdpService().retrieveCurrencies(getCompany());
     }

     // Extract code for storage
     protected String getCode(OdpCurrency element) {
         return element.getCode();
     }

     // Extract description for display
     protected String getDescription(OdpCurrency element) {
         return element.getDescription();
     }
 }

Company-Filtered Param

Params whose options depend on selected company: 


 // Company must be selected first
 public abstract class OdpCompanyBasedAbstractParam<T> extends OdpServiceBasedAbstractParam<T> {
     protected OdpCompany getCompany() {
         // Get company from form context
         return ...;
     }

     protected List<T> retrieveElements() throws Exception {
         OdpCompany company = getCompany();
         if (company == null) {
             return Collections.emptyList();
         }
         return retrieveElementsByCompany(company);
     }

     protected abstract List<T> retrieveElementsByCompany(OdpCompany company) throws Exception;
 }

User-Filtered Param

Params filtered by current user's permissions: 


 public class OdpCompanyByUserParam extends OdpServiceBasedAbstractParam<OdpCompany> {
     protected List<OdpCompany> retrieveElements() throws Exception {
         // Returns only companies accessible to current user
         return getIOdpService().retrieveCompanies(getOdpUser());
     }
 }

Field Types

Coded Entity Params

For entities with code + description (dropdowns/autocomplete):

  • Extend ERPCodedParam
  • Implement retrieveElements()
  • Implement getCode() and getDescription()
  • Support autocomplete or dropdown display

Simple Value Params

For simple values (text, numbers, dates):

  • Use framework-provided params (TextParam, NumericParam, DateParam)
  • Configure validation rules
  • Set format patterns

Validation Examples

Required Field


 public class OdpCompanyParam extends OdpServiceBasedAbstractParam<OdpCompany> {
     public OdpCompanyParam() {
         setMandatory(true); // Field is required
     }
 }

Conditional Requirement


 // Field required only in certain states
 if (odp.getStato() == OdpStateType.DRAFT) {
     someParam.setMandatory(true);
 } else {
     someParam.setMandatory(false);
 }

Custom Validation

{@code
 public class ImportoParam extends NumericParam {
